titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1931 REYNAL
Miss Jean Reynal
25 Quai des St Augustin
Subscription 1 m. 1 vol Jan 23rd. 40frs dep 50
Jan 23. Passion, Crime, etc. Jan 26 " 23 Mystery of the Yellow Room " 26 Jan 26 Murder of Roger Ackroyd Feb. 19 " 28 S.R. 1m 1 vol = 40f to March 23rd.
Feb 28 J. Swift Choice Works Mch. 21 p.c. May 7 Ap. 20 p.c. subs due since Mch 23rd
May 7th S. R. 1m 1 vol = 32f Stud = to June 7th 1931
May 7 Women in Love to be kept longer May 29. interrupted. June 8 Portraits in Miniature June 15.
REYNAL
Miss REYNAL Jeanne
45 rue Boissonnade 14th
April 8 - July 8 3 m. 1 v. 65f dep. 50 April 8 Around the World in eleven days April 10 10 Inhibitions Symptoms + Anxiety April 22 10 Women in Love. April 22 22 Theatre. 28 22 Weather in the Streets owes 6v 28. 28 Absalom Absalom - May. 18 May. 27 Door Between pd 11v June 2 27 Nightwood .renewed June 2. June 9 June.2. Phoenix July 6 9 Winner Take Nothing July 6 England My England July 6 6 Burmese Days Sept. 17 6 Death of a Man 17. sub due. 28 sent pc. for books - and about closure
Renewed Nov 26 1937 - February 26 1938 old dep 50f 1 vol new 135v
Nov 26 Rains came owes 6 frs. Dec. 9 Murder at 28.10 Dec. 2 Dec. 2 I love under a Black Sun Dec. 9 9 Asiatics Dec 20 9 Movies for the Millions Dec. 23 suspended for 1 m & 1/2 (to April 9th)
(subsc.) to April 9th REYNAL 1938 Feb 8 As I was going down Sackville St. Feb. 24 " 8 Fountain Feb. 24 24 To have & to have not Febr. 28 24 New. Yorker (extra) returned March 10 Present Indicative (extra) Ap. 2 10 Frued and Marx paid 23 frs. Ap. 2 extras April 2 Ap. 2 Unvanquished Ap 9 (returned by Mrs Massey)
May 4 1940 got catalogue notice of exposition of Jeanne Renal Mosaics with Bromfield Preface Address of Gallery Walker Galleries 8630 Sunset Boulevard West Hollywood Cal (post marked Santa Monica)
